snippet: Contact with the Christians was lost after the jihadists attacked the isolated oasis town of Qariyatain in Homs Province and routed the Syrian Army.
abstract: About 250 Christian civilians are missing and believed to be captives of Islamic State after it seizes Syrian town of Qariyatain in Homs Province.

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and HWAIDA SAAD
byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Istanbul, and Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: Contact with the Christians was lost after the jihadists attacked the isolated oasis town of Qariyatain in Homs Province and routed the Syrian Army.

headline.main: Dozens of Syrian Christians Missing From Town Attacked by ISIS
headline.print_headline: Dozens of Syrian Christians Missing From Town Attacked by ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
